Package fun.connor.fantasy.Statistics

Class BatterStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.fantasy.Statistics.BatterStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AthleteStatistics
    public class BatterStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements AthleteStatistics
    The BatterStatistics class serves as the statistics module for batters. It provides the necessary logic to handle batter data.
